text: [Music]
greetings my name is Matt Wood and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to announce the general availability of
Amazon quicksite Amazon quicksite is a
very fast business analytics service
that makes it easy for you to build
visualizations perform ad hoc analysis
and quickly get business insights from
your data you can upload Excel files
connect to databases like SQL Server
MySQL or postgress access thirdparty
applications like sales force or analyze
data from other AWS services such as RDS
red shift or S3 once you've built your
analysis or dashboard you can securely
share it with colleagues and
stakeholders in just a few seconds
quicksite is built to harness the power
and scalability of the cloud so you can
easily run analysis on large data sets
and support hundreds of thousands of
users you can try quick site for free
today thanks a lot
